name: Hermite Spelunking
description:
This game is a procedurally generated, infinite Rune (flyer). The tunnel generation process makes a 3D cubic Hermite spline between randomly chosen way points (within a range). The aesthetic is vaporwave and the music is "Somethings Out There", by Holizna - shout out to Holizna for licencing this under Creative Commons!

https://freemusicarchive.org/music/holiznacc0/stranger-than-fiction-halloween-sci-fi/somethings-out-there/

CONTROLS

MOUSE:  TO MOVE

ESC: TO PAUSE
